# I hate people
I always seem to be trying to convince myself that I like people. That it's fun to be in the presence of other humans. But I don't and it's not. I *hate* people. They will *always* fuck you over. In some way or another, they will. I have met a single person, in 25 years, that has not fucked me over. Good thing I married that person, seemingly the only use for the archaic ceremony. 

So, people will always fuck you over. Whether it's a subtle fuck (like being a bitch to you for no apparent reason), or a mighty fuck (like standing you up on one of the most important days of your life). 

I'm done. **I'm done.**

I'll see how I can distance myself from everyone, but still collect enough money to survive.
